pets.name: Poodle Mix
pets.img: ./images/20 Dogs Mixed With Poodles - The Paws.jpg
pets.description: A beautiful poodle mix with a friendly and energetic personality. Great with families and loves playtime!

pets.name: Bulldog
pets.description: A strong and loyal bulldog who loves cuddles and enjoys leisurely walks. Perfect lap dog for someone special!

pets.name: Shih Tzu
pets.description: An adorable Shih Tzu with a fluffy coat and sweet temperament. Loves being groomed and pampered!

pets.name: Golden
pets.description: A beautiful and friendly golden retriever looking for a loving home. Very playful and great with families!

pets.name: Buddy
pets.description: A loyal and obedient dog who is well-trained and friendly. Great family companion with a gentle nature!

pets.name: Luna
pets.description: A beautiful and energetic dog who loves outdoor activities. Perfect for active families who enjoy adventures!

pets.name: Max
pets.description: A wonderful cocker spaniel and beagle mix with boundless energy and love. Great for experienced dog owners!

pets.name: Frost
pets.description: A stunning and majestic husky with a wonderful temperament. Loves snow and outdoor adventures!

pets.name: German Shepherd

pets.description: A noble and intelligent German Shepherd who is protective and loyal. Great working dog or family pet!

pets.name: Chihuahua
pets.description: A tiny and adorable chihuahua with a big personality. Perfect for apartment living and loves being a companion!
